LOCALS_DEF.item: *"* use this source file for any type of declarations (class
*"* definitions, interfaces or type declarations) you need for

LOCALS_IMP.item: *"* use this source file for the definition and implementation of
*"* local helper classes, interface definitions and type

LOCALS_MAC.item: *"* use this source file for any macro definitions you need
*"* in the implementation part of the class

ADD_ATTACHMENT.item: * 1. Passare i parametri IV_ATTACHMENT_TYPE, IV_ATTACHMENT_SUBJECT, IV
* in una tabella per allegare documenti multipli
* 2. aggiungere il campo file alla tabella sopra per permettere di all

ADD_RECIPIENT.item: * create recipient - please replace e-mail address !!!
* add recipient with its respective attributes to send request

ADD_SIGNATURE.item: CLEAR: ls_usr21, ls_adr6, ls_adrp, ls_adr2, ls_adr3, lv_uname.
SELECT SINGLE * INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF ls_usr21
SELECT SINGLE * INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF ls_adr6
SELECT SINGLE * INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF ls_adrp
SELECT * INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF TABLE lt_adr2
SELECT SINGLE * INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF ls_adr3
READ TABLE lt_adr2 INTO ls_adr2 WITH KEY r3_user = '1'.
READ TABLE lt_adr2 INTO ls_adr2 WITH KEY r3_user = '3'.

CONSTRUCTOR.item: MESSAGE ID sy-msgid TYPE sy-msgty NUMBER sy-msgno

UPLOAD_MIME.item: DATA: lo_mime TYPE REF TO zcl_itlink_mime.
